text: private void UpdatedResultData(object Sender, EventArgs arg) { if (arg is UpdateInspectionBaordEventArgs boardArg) { inspBaordCond = boardArg.BoardCondition; CurrentVientlodel?. UpdateBoard(inspBaordCond) ; } [if (arg is UpdateInspectionResultEventArgs resultArg)) { inspItem = resultArg.InspectionItem; inspResult = resultArg.InspectionItemResult; CurrentViewModel?.UpdateItemResult(inspResult); ChartViewModelUpdateIten(); } }
